name: Space Surfer (uhqqoW)
description:
Hi, after a long time it's me again with another game!

Space Surfer is a game in which you must take the controls of the rocket and avoid various obstacles who are dangerous and can destroy your ship. BUT, that's not all! You must also control your fuel level and do not allow for rocket to overturn.

I hope you will enjoy gameplay. Don't forget to leave comment and post your highscore below. Have fun!

Android Version: 

Controls:

- Use your mouse to steer rocket.

- Hold LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to invert steer axis.

Credits:

Music & SFX by: https://juhanijunkala.com
